 0240: 
+0241:     cdef float delta_t_sqrt = sqrt(delta_t) # correct scalar so we can use standard normal samples for the brownian motion
  __pyx_v_delta_t_sqrt = sqrt(__pyx_v_delta_t);

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_4cssm_6ddm_cov(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_a, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_t, float __pyx_v_s, float __pyx_v_delta_t, float __pyx_v_max_t, int __pyx_v_n_samples, int __pyx_v_n_trials, PyObject *__pyx_v_random_state, PyObject *__pyx_v_smooth) {
  PyObject *__pyx_v_rts = NULL;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_choices = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_rts_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_choices_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_v_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_a_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_z_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_t_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  float __pyx_v_delta_t_sqrt;
  float __pyx_v_sqrt_st;
  float __pyx_v_y;
  float __pyx_v_t_particle;
  float __pyx_v_smooth_u;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_n;
  Py_ssize_t __pyx_v_k;
  int __pyx_v_m;
  int __pyx_v_num_draws;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_gaussian_values = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_a;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_a;
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_t;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_t;
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_v;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_v;
  __Pyx_LocalBuf_ND __pyx_pybuffernd_z;
  __Pyx_Buffer __pyx_pybuffer_z;
  PyObject *__pyx_r = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffer_v.pybuffer.buf = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffer_v.refcount = 0;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_v.data = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_v.rcbuffer = &__pyx_pybuffer_v;
  __pyx_pybuffer_a.pybuffer.buf = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffer_a.refcount = 0;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_a.data = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_a.rcbuffer = &__pyx_pybuffer_a;
  __pyx_pybuffer_z.pybuffer.buf = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffer_z.refcount = 0;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_z.data = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_z.rcbuffer = &__pyx_pybuffer_z;
  __pyx_pybuffer_t.pybuffer.buf = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffer_t.refcount = 0;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_t.data = NULL;
  __pyx_pybuffernd_t.rcbuffer = &__pyx_pybuffer_t;

 0514: 
 0515: # Simulate (rt, choice) tuples from: DDM WITH FLEXIBLE BOUNDARIES,
 0516: # but also apply a DEADLINE to rts. Any rt that exceeds the deadline is treated
 0517: # as a miss.
 0518: # @cythonboundscheck(False)
 0519: # @cythonwraparound(False)

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_4cssm_12ddm_flex(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_a, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_t, float __pyx_v_s, float __pyx_v_delta_t, float __pyx_v_max_t, int __pyx_v_n_samples, int __pyx_v_n_trials, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_fun, PyObject *__pyx_v_drift_fun, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_multiplicative, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_params, PyObject *__pyx_v_drift_params, PyObject *__pyx_v_random_state, PyObject *__pyx_v_smooth) {

  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_a_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_z_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_4cssm_16glob_flexbound(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_a, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_alphar, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_g, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_t, float __pyx_v_s, float __pyx_v_delta_t, float __pyx_v_max_t, int __pyx_v_n_samples, int __pyx_v_n_trials, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_fun, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_multiplicative, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_params, PyObject *__pyx_v_random_state, PyObject *__pyx_v_smooth) {

  PyObject *__pyx_v_rts = NULL;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_choices = NULL;

  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_choices_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };

  int __pyx_v_num_draws;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_t_s = NULL;
  PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary = NULL;
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_boundary_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_4cssm_28lca(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_a, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_g, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_b, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_t, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_s, float __pyx_v_delta_t, float __pyx_v_max_t, int __pyx_v_n_samples, int __pyx_v_n_trials, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_fun, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_multiplicative, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_params, PyObject *__pyx_v_random_state, PyObject *__pyx_v_smooth) {

 2086:                 # The probability of making a 'mistake' 1 - (relative y position)
 2087:                 # y at upper bound --> choices_view[n, k, 0] add one deterministically
 2088:                 # y at lower bound --> choice_view[n, k, 0] stays the same deterministically
 2089:

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_4cssm_32ddm_flexbound_par2(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v_h, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v_l_1, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v_l_2, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_a, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z_h, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z_l_1, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z_l_2, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_t, float __pyx_v_s, float __pyx_v_delta_t, float __pyx_v_max_t, int __pyx_v_n_samples, int __pyx_v_n_trials, CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_v_print_info, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_fun, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_multiplicative, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_params, PyObject *__pyx_v_random_state, PyObject *__pyx_v_smooth) {
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_v_h_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };

 2153:     # TD: Add trajectory --> Tricky here because the simulator is optimized to include only two instead of three particles (high dimension choice determines which low dimension choice will matter for ultimate choice)
 2154:

 2211:             # The probability of making a 'mistake' 1 - (relative y position)
 2212:             # y at upper bound --> choices_view[n, k, 0] add 2 deterministically (correct)
 2213:             # y at lower bound --> choice_view[n, k, 0] stay the same deterministically (mistake)
 2214:

 2301: #                           int n_samples = 20000,

 2336: #
 2337: #    # Boundary storage for the upper bound

static PyObject *__pyx_pf_4cssm_34ddm_flexbound_mic2_ornstein(CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_self, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v_h, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v_l_1, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_v_l_2, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_a, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z_h, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z_l_1, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_z_l_2, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_d, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_g, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_t, float __pyx_v_s, float __pyx_v_s_pre_high_level_choice, float __pyx_v_delta_t, float __pyx_v_max_t, int __pyx_v_n_samples, int __pyx_v_n_trials, CYTHON_UNUSED PyObject *__pyx_v_print_info, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_fun, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_multiplicative, PyObject *__pyx_v_boundary_params, PyObject *__pyx_v_random_state, PyObject *__pyx_v_smooth) {
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_v_h_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_v_l_1_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_v_l_2_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_a_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };
  __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_z_h_view = { 0, 0, { 0 }, { 0 }, { 0 } };

 2879: ## Simulate (rt, choice) tuples from: DDM WITH FLEXIBLE BOUNDARIES ------------------------------------
 2880: ## @cythonboundscheck(False)
 2881: ## @cythonwraparound(False)
 2882: #def ddm_flexbound_mic2(np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] v_h,
 2883: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] v_l_1,
 2884: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] v_l_2,
 2885: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] a,
 2886: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] z_h,
 2887: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] z_l_1,
 2888: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] z_l_2,
 2889: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] d, # d for 'dampen' effect on drift parameter
 2890: #                       np.ndarray[float, ndim = 1] t,
 2891: #                       float s = 1,
 2892: #                       float delta_t = 0.001,
 2893: #                       float max_t = 20,
 2894: #                       int n_samples = 20000,
 2895: #                       int n_trials = 1,
 2896: #                       print_info = True,
 2897: #                       boundary_fun = None, # function of t (and potentially other parameters) that takes in (t, *args)
 2898: #                       boundary_multiplicative = True,
 2899: #                       boundary_params = {}
 2900: #                       ):
 2901: #    # Param views
 2902: #    cdef float[:] v_h_view = v_h
 2903: #    cdef float[:] v_l_1_view = v_l_1
 2904: #    cdef float[:] v_l_2_view = v_l_2
 2905: #    cdef float[:] a_view = a
 2906: #    cdef float[:] z_h_view = z_h
 2907: #    cdef float[:] z_l_1_view = z_l_1
 2908: #    cdef float[:] z_l_2_view = z_l_2
 2909: #    cdef float[:] d_view = d
 2910: #    cdef float[:] t_view = t
 2911: #
 2912: #    # TD: Add trajectory --> same issue as with par2 model above... might need to make a separate simulator for trajectories
 2913: #
 2914: #    rts = np.zeros((n_samples, n_trials, 1), dtype = DTYPE)
 2915: #    choices = np.zeros((n_samples, n_trials, 1), dtype = np.intc)
 2916: #
 2917: #    cdef float[:, :, :] rts_view = rts
 2918: #    cdef int[:, :, :] choices_view = choices
 2919: #
 2920: #    cdef float delta_t_sqrt = sqrt(delta_t) # correct scalar so we can use standard normal samples for the brownian motion
 2921: #    cdef float sqrt_st = delta_t_sqrt * s # scalar to ensure the correct variance for the gaussian step
 2922: #
 2923: #    # Boundary storage for the upper bound
 2924: #    cdef int num_draws = int((max_t / delta_t) + 1)
 2925: #
 2926: #    t_s = np.arange(0, max_t + delta_t, delta_t).astype(DTYPE)
 2927: #    boundary = np.zeros(t_s.shape, dtype = DTYPE)
 2928: #    cdef float[:] boundary_view = boundary
 2929: #
 2930: #    # Y particle trace
 2931: #    bias_trace = np.zeros(num_draws, dtype = DTYPE)
 2932: #    cdef float[:] bias_trace_view = bias_trace
 2933: #
 2934: #    cdef float y_h, y_l, v_l, t_h, t_l
 2935: #    cdef Py_ssize_t n, ix, ix_tmp, k
 2936: #    cdef Py_ssize_t m = 0

 2938: #
 2939: #    for k in range(n_trials):
 2940: #        # Precompute boundary evaluations
 2941: #        boundary_params_tmp = {key: boundary_params[key][k] for key in boundary_params.keys()}

 2943: #        # Precompute boundary evaluations
 2944: #        if boundary_multiplicative:
 2945: #            # print(a)
 2946: #            boundary[:] = np.multiply(a_view[k], boundary_fun(t = t_s, **boundary_params_tmp)).astype(DTYPE)
 2947: #        else:
 2948: #            # print(a)
 2949: #            boundary[:] = np.add(a_view[k], boundary_fun(t = t_s, **boundary_params_tmp)).astype(DTYPE)
 2950: #
 2951: #
 2952: #        # Loop over samples
 2953: #        for n in range(n_samples):
 2954: #            t_h = 0 # reset time high dimension
 2955: #            t_l = 0 # reset time low dimension
 2956: #            ix = 0 # reset boundary index
 2957: #
 2958: #            # Initialize walkers
 2959: #            y_h = (-1) * boundary_view[0] + (z_h_view[k] * 2 * (boundary_view[0]))
 2960: #            bias_trace_view[0] = ((boundary_view[0] - y_h) / (2 * boundary_view[0]))

 2978: #

 2986: #                    bias_trace_view[ix_tmp] = 1.0 - bias_trace_view[ix_tmp]

 2989: #            else:

 3015: #                                                         'vl1': v_l_1,
